#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
Integration Test for Enhanced Agent Zero Trading System
Tests the complete integration of all enhanced components
"""

import asyncio
import sys
import os
from pathlib import Path

# Add the current directory to Python path
current_dir = Path(__file__).parent
sys.path.insert(0, str(current_dir))

from enhanced_initialize import initialize_enhanced_agent_zero, setup_enhanced_environment
from python.helpers.print_style import PrintStyle


async def test_enhanced_system():
    """Test the enhanced Agent Zero system"""
    
    PrintStyle(font_color="cyan", background_color="white", padding=True).print(
        "ðŸ§ª Starting Enhanced Agent Zero Integration Test"
    )
    
    try:
        # Setup environment
        PrintStyle(font_color="blue", padding=True).print("1. Setting up environment...")
        setup_enhanced_environment()
        
        # Initialize enhanced system
        PrintStyle(font_color="blue", padding=True).print("2. Initializing enhanced system...")
        enhanced_system = await initialize_enhanced_agent_zero()
        
        # Test capabilities
        PrintStyle(font_color="blue", padding=True).print("3. Testing system capabilities...")
        capabilities = enhanced_system.get_capabilities()
        
        # Display test results
        PrintStyle(font_color="blue", padding=True).print("4. Test Results:")
        
        test_results = []
        
        # Test original Agent Zero
        original_working = capabilities.get("original_agent_zero", False)
        test_results.append(("Original Agent Zero", original_working))
        
        # Test AutoGen integration
        autogen_working = capabilities.get("autogen", False)
        test_results.append(("AutoGen v0.4 Multi-Agent", autogen_working))
        
        # Test memory system
        memory_working = capabilities.get("memory", False)
        test_results.append(("Letta Memory System", memory_working))
        
        # Test data persistence
        redis_working = capabilities.get("redis", False)
        supabase_working = capabilities.get("supabase", False)
        test_results.append(("Redis Cache", redis_working))
        test_results.append(("Supabase Database", supabase_working))
        
        # Test MCP server
        mcp_working = capabilities.get("mcp_server", False)
        test_results.append(("Enhanced MCP Server", mcp_working))
        
        # Test trading integration
        hyperliquid_working = capabilities.get("hyperliquid", False)
        test_results.append(("Hyperliquid Trading", hyperliquid_working))
        
        # Display results
        for component, working in test_results:
            status_icon = "âœ…" if working else "âŒ"
            status_text = "WORKING" if working else "NOT AVAILABLE"
            color = "green" if working else "red"
            
            PrintStyle(font_color=color, padding=False).print(
                f"   {status_icon} {component}: {status_text}"
            )
        
        # Test basic functionality
        PrintStyle(font_color="blue", padding=True).print("5. Testing basic functionality...")
        
        if enhanced_system.original_context:
            agent = enhanced_system.original_context.agent0
            
            # Test enhanced tools
            PrintStyle(font_color="white", padding=False).print("   Testing enhanced tools access...")
            
            autogen_data = agent.get_data("enhanced_autogen")
            memory_data = agent.get_data("enhanced_memory")
            redis_data = agent.get_data("enhanced_redis")
            supabase_data = agent.get_data("enhanced_supabase")
            
            tools_integrated = all([
                autogen_data is not None,
                memory_data is not None,
                redis_data is not None,
                supabase_data is not None
            ])
            
            if tools_integrated:
                PrintStyle(font_color="green", padding=False).print("   âœ… Enhanced tools integrated with Agent Zero")
            else:
                PrintStyle(font_color="yellow", padding=False).print("   âš ï¸  Some enhanced tools not fully integrated")
        
        # Calculate overall score
        working_count = sum(1 for _, working in test_results if working)
        total_count = len(test_results)
        score_percentage = (working_count / total_count) * 100
        
        PrintStyle(font_color="blue", padding=True).print("6. Test Summary:")
        PrintStyle(font_color="white", padding=False).print(f"   Components Working: {working_count}/{total_count}")
        PrintStyle(font_color="white", padding=False).print(f"   System Health: {score_percentage:.1f}%")
        
        # Overall status
        if score_percentage >= 80:
            PrintStyle(font_color="green", background_color="white", padding=True).print(
                "ðŸŽ‰ Enhanced Agent Zero Trading System: FULLY OPERATIONAL"
            )
        elif score_percentage >= 60:
            PrintStyle(font_color="yellow", background_color="white", padding=True).print(
                "âš¡ Enhanced Agent Zero Trading System: PARTIALLY OPERATIONAL"
            )
        else:
            PrintStyle(font_color="red", background_color="white", padding=True).print(
                "âš ï¸  Enhanced Agent Zero Trading System: LIMITED FUNCTIONALITY"
            )
        
        # Usage instructions
        PrintStyle(font_color="cyan", padding=True).print("ðŸ“‹ Usage Instructions:")
        PrintStyle(font_color="white", padding=False).print("   1. Run the enhanced system: python enhanced_initialize.py")
        PrintStyle(font_color="white", padding=False).print("   2. Start the web UI: python run_ui.py")
        PrintStyle(font_color="white", padding=False).print("   3. Access the Trading tab in the web interface")
        PrintStyle(font_color="white", padding=False).print("   4. Use trading tools via: trading_system_tool")
        PrintStyle(font_color="white", padding=False).print("   5. Create agents via: hyperliquid_trading_tool")
        
        return enhanced_system, score_percentage
        
    except Exception as e:
        PrintStyle(font_color="red", padding=True).print(f"âŒ Test failed: {e}")
        raise


async def test_trading_functionality():
    """Test specific trading functionality"""
    
    PrintStyle(font_color="cyan", padding=True).print("ðŸ”„ Testing Trading Functionality...")
    
    try:
        # Test trading system tool
        from python.tools.trading_system import TradingSystem
        
        # Create mock agent for testing
        class MockAgent:
            def __init__(self):
                self.number = 0
                self.agent_name = "test_agent"
                self.context = None
        
        mock_agent = MockAgent()
        trading_tool = TradingSystem(agent=mock_agent)
        
        # Test market data
        PrintStyle(font_color="blue", padding=True).print("Testing market data retrieval...")
        result = await trading_tool.execute(action="market_data", symbol="BTC")
        
        if "error" not in result.message:
            PrintStyle(font_color="green", padding=False).print("   âœ… Market data retrieval: WORKING")
        else:
            PrintStyle(font_color="yellow", padding=False).print("   âš ï¸  Market data retrieval: LIMITED")
        
        # Test portfolio
        PrintStyle(font_color="blue", padding=True).print("Testing portfolio access...")
        result = await trading_tool.execute(action="portfolio")
        
        if "error" not in result.message:
            PrintStyle(font_color="green", padding=False).print("   âœ… Portfolio access: WORKING")
        else:
            PrintStyle(font_color="yellow", padding=False).print("   âš ï¸  Portfolio access: LIMITED")
        
        PrintStyle(font_color="green", padding=True).print("ðŸŽ¯ Trading functionality test complete")
        
    except Exception as e:
        PrintStyle(font_color="red", padding=True).print(f"âŒ Trading test failed: {e}")


if __name__ == "__main__":
    async def main():
        # Test enhanced system
        enhanced_system, score = await test_enhanced_system()
        
        # Test trading functionality
        await test_trading_functionality()
        
        # Final message
        PrintStyle(font_color="cyan", background_color="white", padding=True).print(
            "ðŸš€ Enhanced Agent Zero Trading System Integration Test Complete! ðŸš€"
        )
    
    asyncio.run(main())

# Enhanced Agent Zero Trading System

This is a comprehensive enhancement of the original Agent Zero framework that integrates advanced trading capabilities, multi-agent systems, persistent memory, and real-time data processing while preserving all existing functionality.

## ðŸš€ Key Features

### Original Agent Zero Functionality âœ…
- All original Agent Zero features preserved
- Existing web UI and chat functionality
- Original tool system and MCP integration
- Docker support and SSH execution

### Enhanced Multi-Agent System ðŸ¤–
- **AutoGen v0.4 Integration**: Multi-agent conversations and collaborative decision making
- **Specialized Trading Agents**: Market analysts, risk managers, and execution specialists
- **Custom Agent Teams**: Create and manage teams for specific trading strategies
- **Agent Persistence**: Agents remember past interactions and decisions

### Advanced Memory System ðŸ§ 
- **Letta (MemGPT) Integration**: Long-term, semantic memory for agents
- **Persistent Context**: Agents retain knowledge across sessions
- **Memory Recall**: Intelligent retrieval of relevant past information
- **Learning Capabilities**: Agents improve performance over time

### Data Persistence & Caching âš¡
- **Redis Integration**: High-speed caching for real-time data
- **Supabase Database**: Persistent storage for trading history and agent data
- **Session Management**: Maintain state across restarts
- **Performance Tracking**: Store and analyze trading performance

### Trading Capabilities ðŸ“ˆ
- **Hyperliquid Integration**: Live trading on Hyperliquid DEX
- **Paper Trading**: Safe testing environment
- **Multi-Strategy Support**: Momentum, mean reversion, breakout, and custom strategies
- **Risk Management**: Automated position sizing and risk controls
- **Portfolio Management**: Real-time portfolio tracking and analytics

### Enhanced UI ðŸŽ¨
- **Trading Dashboard**: Dedicated trading interface within Agent Zero
- **Agent Creation**: Easy-to-use agent creation and management
- **Real-time Monitoring**: Live portfolio and performance tracking
- **Market Analysis**: Interactive market analysis tools

## ðŸ“¦ Installation

### Prerequisites
```bash
# Install enhanced requirements
pip install -r enhanced_requirements.txt

# Or install core Agent Zero first, then enhanced features
pip install -r requirements.txt
pip install -r enhanced_requirements.txt
```

### Environment Variables
Create a `.env` file with the following variables:

#### Required (Core Functionality)
```bash
# OpenAI API for AutoGen and chat models
OPENAI_API_KEY=your_openai_api_key

# Supabase for persistent data storage
SUPABASE_URL=your_supabase_project_url
SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=your_supabase_anon_key
```

#### Optional (Enhanced Features)
```bash
# Redis for high-speed caching
REDIS_URL=redis://localhost:6379

# Letta for advanced memory
LETTA_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8283
LETTA_TOKEN=your_letta_token

# Hyperliquid for live trading
HYPERLIQUID_PRIVATE_KEY=your_trading_private_key

# Anthropic for additional AI models
ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=your_anthropic_api_key
```

## ðŸš€ Quick Start

### 1. Run the Integration Test
```bash
cd agent-zero
python test_enhanced_system.py
```

### 2. Start the Enhanced System
```bash
# Initialize with enhanced features
python enhanced_initialize.py

# Start the web UI
python run_ui.py
```

### 3. Access the Trading Interface
1. Open your browser to `http://localhost:8000`
2. Click the "Trading" tab in the left sidebar
3. Create your first trading agent
4. Start analyzing markets and making trades

## ðŸ”§ Architecture

### Component Integration
```

```

### Enhanced Tools
- `trading_system`: Main trading orchestration tool
- `hyperliquid_trading`: Direct Hyperliquid integration
- `memory_recall`: Access persistent agent memories
- `autogen_collaboration`: Multi-agent conversations

## ðŸ“ˆ Trading Features

### Supported Strategies
1. **Momentum Trading**: Follow market trends
2. **Mean Reversion**: Trade against extremes
3. **Breakout Trading**: Capitalize on price breakouts
4. **Scalping**: High-frequency small profits
5. **Custom Strategies**: Define your own logic

### Risk Management
- Automated position sizing
- Stop-loss and take-profit orders
- Portfolio diversification tracking
- Real-time risk monitoring

### Market Data
- Real-time price feeds
- Historical data analysis
- Technical indicators
- Market sentiment analysis

## ðŸ¤– Agent Management

### Creating Trading Agents
```python
# Via tool usage in chat
"Create a trading agent named 'BTC_Momentum' using momentum strategy for BTC with medium risk tolerance"

# Via web interface
1. Go to Trading tab
2. Click "New Agent"
3. Configure strategy and parameters
4. Click "Create Agent"
```

### Agent Types
- **Market Analyst**: Analyzes market conditions and trends
- **Risk Manager**: Manages position sizing and risk controls
- **Execution Specialist**: Handles trade execution and timing
- **Portfolio Manager**: Optimizes portfolio allocation

## ðŸ§  Memory & Learning

### Persistent Memory
- Agents remember past trading decisions
- Learn from successful and unsuccessful trades
- Maintain context across sessions
- Share knowledge between similar agents

### Memory Queries
```python
# Recall relevant trading memories
"Recall my previous BTC trading decisions from the last month"

# Search for specific patterns
"What did I learn about trading during market volatility?"
```

## ðŸ“Š Data & Analytics

### Performance Tracking
- Real-time P&L monitoring
- Trade history and analytics
- Strategy performance comparison
- Risk-adjusted returns

### Data Storage
- **Redis**: Real-time market data, session state
- **Supabase**: Trading history, agent configurations, performance metrics
- **Letta**: Long-term agent memories and learning data

## ðŸ” Security & Safety

### Trading Safety
- Paper trading mode by default
- Confirmation required for live trades
- Position size limits
- Stop-loss protections

### Data Security
- API keys stored securely
- Database connections encrypted
- Memory data anonymized
- Trading keys isolated

## ðŸŽ¯ Usage Examples

### Basic Market Analysis
```
Agent: "Analyze BTC market conditions using momentum strategy"
Response: Multi-agent collaboration provides comprehensive analysis with entry/exit signals
```

### Create Specialized Agent
```
Agent: "Create a risk-averse ETH trading agent that focuses on scalping"
Response: Agent created with appropriate risk parameters and scalping strategy
```

### Portfolio Management
```
Agent: "Show my current portfolio status and suggest rebalancing"
Response: Real-time portfolio data with AI-powered rebalancing suggestions
```

## ðŸ”„ Integration with Original Agent Zero

### Preserved Functionality
- All original tools continue to work
- Existing chat and conversation features
- Original web UI remains unchanged
- Docker and SSH execution preserved

### Enhanced Capabilities
- Trading tools available in any conversation
- Memory persists across all agent interactions
- Multi-agent collaboration for any task
- Real-time data integration

## ðŸ› ï¸ Development

### Adding Custom Strategies
```python
# Create new strategy in python/tools/
class CustomStrategy(TradingStrategy):
    async def analyze(self, market_data):
        # Your custom logic here
        return decision
```

### Extending Memory
```python
# Add custom memory types
await memory_system.store_memory(
    agent, 
    content="Custom insight",
    memory_type="custom",
    importance=0.8
)
```

## ðŸ› Troubleshooting

### Common Issues
1. **AutoGen not available**: Install `autogen-agentchat==0.4.0`
2. **Memory system offline**: Check Letta server status
3. **Trading API errors**: Verify Hyperliquid credentials
4. **UI not loading**: Ensure all CSS/JS files are accessible

### Health Check
```bash
python test_enhanced_system.py
```

## ðŸ“ License

This enhanced version maintains the same license as the original Agent Zero project while adding significant trading and AI capabilities.

## ðŸ¤ Contributing

Contributions welcome! Areas of focus:
- Additional trading strategies
- New data sources
- Enhanced risk management
- Performance optimizations
- Documentation improvements

## ðŸ“ž Support

For issues with the enhanced features:
1. Run the integration test
2. Check the health status
3. Review environment variables
4. Consult the troubleshooting guide

The enhanced Agent Zero trading system provides a powerful platform for AI-driven trading while maintaining the simplicity and flexibility of the original Agent Zero framework.

```
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜    â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜    â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
```

### Enhanced Tools
- `trading_system`: Main trading orchestration tool
- `hyperliquid_trading`: Direct Hyperliquid integration
- `memory_recall`: Access persistent agent memories
- `autogen_collaboration`: Multi-agent conversations

## ðŸ“ˆ Trading Features

### Supported Strategies
1. **Momentum Trading**: Follow market trends
2. **Mean Reversion**: Trade against extremes
3. **Breakout Trading**: Capitalize on price breakouts
4. **Scalping**: High-frequency small profits
5. **Custom Strategies**: Define your own logic

### Risk Management
- Automated position sizing
- Stop-loss and take-profit orders
- Portfolio diversification tracking
- Real-time risk monitoring

### Market Data
- Real-time price feeds
- Historical data analysis
- Technical indicators
- Market sentiment analysis

## ðŸ¤– Agent Management

### Creating Trading Agents
```python
# Via tool usage in chat
"Create a trading agent named 'BTC_Momentum' using momentum strategy for BTC with medium risk tolerance"

# Via web interface
1. Go to Trading tab
2. Click "New Agent"
3. Configure strategy and parameters
4. Click "Create Agent"
```

### Agent Types
- **Market Analyst**: Analyzes market conditions and trends
- **Risk Manager**: Manages position sizing and risk controls
- **Execution Specialist**: Handles trade execution and timing
- **Portfolio Manager**: Optimizes portfolio allocation

## ðŸ§  Memory & Learning

### Persistent Memory
- Agents remember past trading decisions
- Learn from successful and unsuccessful trades
- Maintain context across sessions
- Share knowledge between similar agents

### Memory Queries
```python
# Recall relevant trading memories
"Recall my previous BTC trading decisions from the last month"

# Search for specific patterns
"What did I learn about trading during market volatility?"
```

## ðŸ“Š Data & Analytics

### Performance Tracking
- Real-time P&L monitoring
- Trade history and analytics
- Strategy performance comparison
- Risk-adjusted returns

### Data Storage
- **Redis**: Real-time market data, session state
- **Supabase**: Trading history, agent configurations, performance metrics
- **Letta**: Long-term agent memories and learning data

## ðŸ” Security & Safety

### Trading Safety
- Paper trading mode by default
- Confirmation required for live trades
- Position size limits
- Stop-loss protections

### Data Security
- API keys stored securely
- Database connections encrypted
- Memory data anonymized
- Trading keys isolated

## ðŸŽ¯ Usage Examples

### Basic Market Analysis
```
Agent: "Analyze BTC market conditions using momentum strategy"
Response: Multi-agent collaboration provides comprehensive analysis with entry/exit signals
```

### Create Specialized Agent
```
Agent: "Create a risk-averse ETH trading agent that focuses on scalping"
Response: Agent created with appropriate risk parameters and scalping strategy
```

### Portfolio Management
```
Agent: "Show my current portfolio status and suggest rebalancing"
Response: Real-time portfolio data with AI-powered rebalancing suggestions
```

## ðŸ”„ Integration with Original Agent Zero

### Preserved Functionality
- All original tools continue to work
- Existing chat and conversation features
- Original web UI remains unchanged
- Docker and SSH execution preserved

### Enhanced Capabilities
- Trading tools available in any conversation
- Memory persists across all agent interactions
- Multi-agent collaboration for any task
- Real-time data integration

## ðŸ› ï¸ Development

### Adding Custom Strategies
```python
# Create new strategy in python/tools/
class CustomStrategy(TradingStrategy):
    async def analyze(self, market_data):
        # Your custom logic here
        return decision
```

### Extending Memory
```python
# Add custom memory types
await memory_system.store_memory(
    agent, 
    content="Custom insight",
    memory_type="custom",
    importance=0.8
)
```

## ðŸ› Troubleshooting

### Common Issues
1. **AutoGen not available**: Install `autogen-agentchat==0.4.0`
2. **Memory system offline**: Check Letta server status
3. **Trading API errors**: Verify Hyperliquid credentials
4. **UI not loading**: Ensure all CSS/JS files are accessible

### Health Check
```bash
python test_enhanced_system.py
```

## ðŸ“ License

This enhanced version maintains the same license as the original Agent Zero project while adding significant trading and AI capabilities.

## ðŸ¤ Contributing

Contributions welcome! Areas of focus:
- Additional trading strategies
- New data sources
- Enhanced risk management
- Performance optimizations
- Documentation improvements

## ðŸ“ž Support

For issues with the enhanced features:
1. Run the integration test
2. Check the health status
3. Review environment variables
4. Consult the troubleshooting guide

The enhanced Agent Zero trading system provides a powerful platform for AI-driven trading while maintaining the simplicity and flexibility of the original Agent Zero framework.

   170	        portfolio['snapshot_at'] = datetime.now().isoformat()
   171	        return self.set_cache(key, portfolio, ttl)

   174	        """Get cached portfolio snapshot"""
   175	        key = f"portfolio:{agent_name}"
   176	        return self.get_cache(key)

   178	    def publish_trading_event(self, channel: str, event: Dict[str, Any]) -> bool:
   179	        """Publish trading event to Redis channel"""
   180	        
   181	        if self.client:
   182	            try:

   184	                self.client.publish(channel, json.dumps(event))
   185	                return True
   186	            except Exception as e:
   187	                self.logger.error(f"Redis publish failed: {e}")
   188	                
   189	        # In fallback mode, we can't publish, so just log
   190	        self.logger.info(f"Trading event (fallback): {channel} - {event}")
   191	        return False
   192	        
   193	    async def subscribe_trading_events(self, channels: List[str], callback) -> None:
   194	        """Subscribe to trading events"""
   195	        
   196	        if not self.async_client:
   197	            self.logger.warning("Redis async client not available for subscriptions")
   198	            return
   199	            
   200	        try:
   201	            pubsub = self.async_client.pubsub()
   202	            await pubsub.subscribe(*channels)
   203	            
   204	            async for message in pubsub.listen():
   205	                if message['type'] == 'message':
   206	                    try:
   207	                        event = json.loads(message['data'])
   208	                        await callback(message['channel'], event)
   209	                    except Exception as e:
   210	                        self.logger.error(f"Error processing trading event: {e}")
   211	                        
   212	        except Exception as e:
   213	            self.logger.error(f"Redis subscription error: {e}")
   214	            
   215	    def increment_trade_counter(self, agent_name: str, date: str = None) -> int:

   227	                return count
   228	            except Exception as e:

   230	                
   231	        # Fallback counter

   233	        new_count = current + 1

   235	        return new_count

   289	        """Clean up expired cache entries (fallback mode only)"""
   290	        
   291	        if self.client:
   292	            return 0  # Redis handles expiration automatically
   293	            
   294	        # Clean up fallback cache

"""
Supabase Database Integration for Agent Zero Trading System
Provides persistent data storage and real-time subscriptions
"""

import asyncio
import json
import logging
from typing import Dict, List, Optional, Any
from datetime import datetime
import uuid

try:
    from supabase import create_client, Client
    SUPABASE_AVAILABLE = True
except ImportError:
    SUPABASE_AVAILABLE = False
    logging.warning("Supabase not available. Database will use fallback mode.")

from python.helpers.print_style import PrintStyle

class SupabaseIntegration:
    """Supabase integration for persistent data storage"""
    
    def __init__(self, config: Dict[str, Any] = None):
        self.config = config or {}
        self.client = None
        self.data_store = {}  # Fallback storage
        self.logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
        
        if SUPABASE_AVAILABLE:
            self._initialize_client()
    
    def _initialize_client(self):
        """Initialize Supabase client"""
        try:
            url = self.config.get('supabase_url')
            key = self.config.get('supabase_anon_key')
            
            if url and key:
                self.client = create_client(url, key)
                PrintStyle(color="green").print("Supabase client initialized successfully")
            else:
                self.logger.warning("Supabase URL or key not provided")
                
        except Exception as e:
            self.logger.error(f"Failed to initialize Supabase client: {e}")
    
    def create_trading_goal(self, goal_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """Create a new trading goal"""
        
        goal_id = str(uuid.uuid4())
        goal_record = {
            'id': goal_id,
            'name': goal_data.get('name', f'Goal {goal_id[:8]}'),
            'description': goal_data.get('description', ''),
            'target_trades_per_day': goal_data.get('target_trades_per_day', 200),
            'target_profit_per_day': goal_data.get('target_profit_per_day', 5.0),
            'assigned_agents': goal_data.get('assigned_agents', []),
            'status': goal_data.get('status', 'active'),
            'created_at': datetime.now().isoformat(),
            'updated_at': datetime.now().isoformat()
        }
        
        if self.client:
            try:
                result = self.client.table('trading_goals').insert(goal_record).execute()
                if result.data:
                    PrintStyle(color="cyan").print(f"Created trading goal: {goal_record['name']}")
                    return result.data[0]
            except Exception as e:
                self.logger.error(f"Failed to create goal in Supabase: {e}")
        
        # Fallback storage
        self.data_store[f"goal_{goal_id}"] = goal_record
        return goal_record
    
    def get_trading_goals(self, status: str = None) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
        """Get trading goals"""
        
        if self.client:
            try:
                query = self.client.table('trading_goals').select('*')
                if status:
                    query = query.eq('status', status)
                result = query.execute()
                return result.data or []
            except Exception as e:
                self.logger.error(f"Failed to get goals from Supabase: {e}")
        
        # Fallback
        goals = [v for k, v in self.data_store.items() if k.startswith('goal_')]
        if status:
            goals = [g for g in goals if g.get('status') == status]
        return goals
    
    def update_goal_progress(self, goal_id: str, progress: Dict[str, Any]) -> bool:
        """Update goal progress"""
        
        update_data = {
            'current_trades': progress.get('current_trades', 0),
            'current_profit': progress.get('current_profit', 0.0),
            'progress_percentage': progress.get('progress_percentage', 0.0),
            'updated_at': datetime.now().isoformat()
        }
        
        if self.client:
            try:
                result = self.client.table('trading_goals').update(update_data).eq('id', goal_id).execute()
                return len(result.data) > 0
            except Exception as e:
                self.logger.error(f"Failed to update goal progress: {e}")
        
        # Fallback
        key = f"goal_{goal_id}"
        if key in self.data_store:
            self.data_store[key].update(update_data)
            return True
        return False
    
    def create_trading_agent(self, agent_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """Create a new trading agent record"""
        
        agent_id = str(uuid.uuid4())
        agent_record = {
            'id': agent_id,
            'name': agent_data.get('name', f'Agent {agent_id[:8]}'),
            'type': agent_data.get('type', 'trading'),
            'specialization': agent_data.get('specialization', 'general'),
            'configuration': agent_data.get('configuration', {}),
            'assigned_goals': agent_data.get('assigned_goals', []),
            'status': agent_data.get('status', 'active'),
            'created_at': datetime.now().isoformat(),
            'updated_at': datetime.now().isoformat()
        }
        
        if self.client:
            try:
                result = self.client.table('trading_agents').insert(agent_record).execute()
                if result.data:
                    return result.data[0]
            except Exception as e:
                self.logger.error(f"Failed to create agent in Supabase: {e}")
        
        # Fallback
        self.data_store[f"agent_{agent_id}"] = agent_record
        return agent_record
    
    def get_trading_agents(self, goal_id: str = None) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
        """Get trading agents"""
        
        if self.client:
            try:
                query = self.client.table('trading_agents').select('*')
                if goal_id:
                    query = query.contains('assigned_goals', [goal_id])
                result = query.execute()
                return result.data or []
            except Exception as e:
                self.logger.error(f"Failed to get agents from Supabase: {e}")
        
        # Fallback
        agents = [v for k, v in self.data_store.items() if k.startswith('agent_')]
        if goal_id:
            agents = [a for a in agents if goal_id in a.get('assigned_goals', [])]
        return agents
    
    def record_trade_execution(self, trade_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """Record a trade execution"""
        
        trade_id = str(uuid.uuid4())
        trade_record = {
            'id': trade_id,
            'agent_id': trade_data.get('agent_id'),
            'goal_id': trade_data.get('goal_id'),
            'symbol': trade_data.get('symbol'),
            'trade_type': trade_data.get('trade_type'),
            'entry_price': trade_data.get('entry_price'),
            'exit_price': trade_data.get('exit_price'),
            'quantity': trade_data.get('quantity'),
            'pnl': trade_data.get('pnl'),
            'fees': trade_data.get('fees', 0),
            'strategy': trade_data.get('strategy'),
            'market_conditions': trade_data.get('market_conditions'),
            'execution_time': trade_data.get('execution_time', datetime.now().isoformat()),
            'created_at': datetime.now().isoformat()
        }
        
        if self.client:
            try:
                result = self.client.table('trade_executions').insert(trade_record).execute()
                if result.data:
                    return result.data[0]
            except Exception as e:
                self.logger.error(f"Failed to record trade in Supabase: {e}")
        
        # Fallback
        self.data_store[f"trade_{trade_id}"] = trade_record
        return trade_record
    
    def get_trade_history(self, agent_id: str = None, goal_id: str = None, limit: int = 100) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
        """Get trade history"""
        
        if self.client:
            try:
                query = self.client.table('trade_executions').select('*').order('created_at', desc=True).limit(limit)
                if agent_id:
                    query = query.eq('agent_id', agent_id)
                if goal_id:
                    query = query.eq('goal_id', goal_id)
                result = query.execute()
                return result.data or []
            except Exception as e:
                self.logger.error(f"Failed to get trade history from Supabase: {e}")
        
        # Fallback
        trades = [v for k, v in self.data_store.items() if k.startswith('trade_')]
        if agent_id:
            trades = [t for t in trades if t.get('agent_id') == agent_id]
        if goal_id:
            trades = [t for t in trades if t.get('goal_id') == goal_id]
        
        # Sort by creation time and limit
        trades.sort(key=lambda x: x.get('created_at', ''), reverse=True)
        return trades[:limit]
    
    def store_trading_strategy(self, strategy_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """Store a trading strategy"""
        
        strategy_id = str(uuid.uuid4())
        strategy_record = {
            'id': strategy_id,
            'name': strategy_data.get('name'),
            'description': strategy_data.get('description'),
            'parameters': strategy_data.get('parameters', {}),
            'sop_content': strategy_data.get('sop_content', ''),
            'performance_metrics': strategy_data.get('performance_metrics', {}),
            'created_by': strategy_data.get('created_by'),
            'created_at': datetime.now().isoformat(),
            'updated_at': datetime.now().isoformat()
        }
        
        if self.client:
            try:
                result = self.client.table('trading_strategies').insert(strategy_record).execute()
                if result.data:
                    return result.data[0]
            except Exception as e:
                self.logger.error(f"Failed to store strategy in Supabase: {e}")
        
        # Fallback
        self.data_store[f"strategy_{strategy_id}"] = strategy_record
        return strategy_record
    
    def get_trading_strategies(self) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
        """Get all trading strategies"""
        
        if self.client:
            try:
                result = self.client.table('trading_strategies').select('*').execute()
                return result.data or []
            except Exception as e:
                self.logger.error(f"Failed to get strategies from Supabase: {e}")
        
        # Fallback
        return [v for k, v in self.data_store.items() if k.startswith('strategy_')]
    
    def get_performance_stats(self, agent_id: str = None, goal_id: str = None) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """Get performance statistics"""
        
        trades = self.get_trade_history(agent_id, goal_id, limit=1000)
        
        if not trades:
            return {
                'total_trades': 0,
                'total_pnl': 0,
                'win_rate': 0,
                'avg_trade_pnl': 0,
                'best_trade': 0,
                'worst_trade': 0
            }
        
        total_trades = len(trades)
        total_pnl = sum(t.get('pnl', 0) for t in trades)
        winning_trades = len([t for t in trades if t.get('pnl', 0) > 0])
        win_rate = (winning_trades / total_trades * 100) if total_trades > 0 else 0
        avg_trade_pnl = total_pnl / total_trades if total_trades > 0 else 0
        
        pnls = [t.get('pnl', 0) for t in trades]
        best_trade = max(pnls) if pnls else 0
        worst_trade = min(pnls) if pnls else 0
        
        return {
            'total_trades': total_trades,
            'total_pnl': total_pnl,

        return SUPABASE_AVAILABLE and self.client is not None

input.content:
"""
Supabase Database Integration for Agent Zero Trading System
Provides persistent data storage and real-time subscriptions
"""

import asyncio
import json
import logging
from typing import Dict, List, Optional, Any
from datetime import datetime
import uuid

try:
    from supabase import create_client, Client
    SUPABASE_AVAILABLE = True
except ImportError:
    SUPABASE_AVAILABLE = False
    logging.warning("Supabase not available. Database will use fallback mode.")

from python.helpers.print_style import PrintStyle

class SupabaseIntegration:
    """Supabase integration for persistent data storage"""
    
    def __init__(self, config: Dict[str, Any] = None):
        self.config = config or {}
        self.client = None
        self.data_store = {}  # Fallback storage
        self.logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
        
        if SUPABASE_AVAILABLE:
            self._initialize_client()
    
    def _initialize_client(self):
        """Initialize Supabase client"""
        try:
            url = self.config.get('supabase_url')
            key = self.config.get('supabase_anon_key')
            
            if url and key:
                self.client = create_client(url, key)
                PrintStyle(color="green").print("Supabase client initialized successfully")
            else:
                self.logger.warning("Supabase URL or key not provided")
                
        except Exception as e:
            self.logger.error(f"Failed to initialize Supabase client: {e}")
    
    def create_trading_goal(self, goal_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """Create a new trading goal"""
        
        goal_id = str(uuid.uuid4())
        goal_record = {
            'id': goal_id,
            'name': goal_data.get('name', f'Goal {goal_id[:8]}'),
            'description': goal_data.get('description', ''),
            'target_trades_per_day': goal_data.get('target_trades_per_day', 200),
            'target_profit_per_day': goal_data.get('target_profit_per_day', 5.0),
            'assigned_agents': goal_data.get('assigned_agents', []),
            'status': goal_data.get('status', 'active'),
            'created_at': datetime.now().isoformat(),
            'updated_at': datetime.now().isoformat()
        }
        
        if self.client:
            try:
                result = self.client.table('trading_goals').insert(goal_record).execute()
                if result.data:
                    PrintStyle(color="cyan").print(f"Created trading goal: {goal_record['name']}")
                    return result.data[0]
            except Exception as e:
                self.logger.error(f"Failed to create goal in Supabase: {e}")
        
        # Fallback storage
        self.data_store[f"goal_{goal_id}"] = goal_record
        return goal_record
    
    def get_trading_goals(self, status: str = None) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
        """Get trading goals"""
        
        if self.client:
            try:
                query = self.client.table('trading_goals').select('*')
                if status:
                    query = query.eq('status', status)
                result = query.execute()
                return result.data or []
            except Exception as e:
                self.logger.error(f"Failed to get goals from Supabase: {e}")
        
        # Fallback
        goals = [v for k, v in self.data_store.items() if k.startswith('goal_')]
        if status:
            goals = [g for g in goals if g.get('status') == status]
        return goals
    
    def create_trading_agent(self, agent_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """Create a new trading agent record"""
        
        agent_id = str(uuid.uuid4())
        agent_record = {
            'id': agent_id,
            'name': agent_data.get('name', f'Agent {agent_id[:8]}'),
            'type': agent_data.get('type', 'trading'),
            'specialization': agent_data.get('specialization', 'general'),
            'configuration': agent_data.get('configuration', {}),
            'assigned_goals': agent_data.get('assigned_goals', []),
            'status': agent_data.get('status', 'active'),
            'created_at': datetime.now().isoformat(),
            'updated_at': datetime.now().isoformat()
        }
        
        if self.client:
            try:
                result = self.client.table('trading_agents').insert(agent_record).execute()
                if result.data:
                    return result.data[0]
            except Exception as e:
                self.logger.error(f"Failed to create agent in Supabase: {e}")
        
        # Fallback
        self.data_store[f"agent_{agent_id}"] = agent_record
        return agent_record
    
    def record_trade_execution(self, trade_data: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """Record a trade execution"""
        
        trade_id = str(uuid.uuid4())
        trade_record = {
            'id': trade_id,
            'agent_id': trade_data.get('agent_id'),
            'goal_id': trade_data.get('goal_id'),
            'symbol': trade_data.get('symbol'),
            'trade_type': trade_data.get('trade_type'),
            'entry_price': trade_data.get('entry_price'),
            'exit_price': trade_data.get('exit_price'),
            'quantity': trade_data.get('quantity'),
            'pnl': trade_data.get('pnl'),
            'fees': trade_data.get('fees', 0),
            'strategy': trade_data.get('strategy'),
            'market_conditions': trade_data.get('market_conditions'),
            'execution_time': trade_data.get('execution_time', datetime.now().isoformat()),
            'created_at': datetime.now().isoformat()
        }
        
        if self.client:
            try:
                result = self.client.table('trade_executions').insert(trade_record).execute()
                if result.data:
                    return result.data[0]
            except Exception as e:
                self.logger.error(f"Failed to record trade in Supabase: {e}")
        
        # Fallback
        self.data_store[f"trade_{trade_id}"] = trade_record
        return trade_record
    
    def is_available(self) -> bool:
        """Check if Supabase is available and configured"""
        return SUPABASE_AVAILABLE and self.client is not None

# Global instance
supabase_integration = None

def get_supabase_integration(config: Dict[str, Any] = None) -> SupabaseIntegration:
    """Get or create Supabase integration instance"""
    global supabase_integration
    if supabase_integration is None:
        supabase_integration = SupabaseIntegration(config)
    return supabase_integration

   121	        # Store in Supabase

   163	            - Coordinate with other agents when part of a team
   164	            - Manage risk and protect capital
   165	            
   166	            Always prioritize risk management and capital preservation.\"\"\"
   167

   322	        )

   326

   338

   355	            
   356	            store_trading_outcome(agent_name, trading_experience, self.config)

   358	        # Update Redis counters
   359	        if agent_name != 'system':

   361	        
   362	        # Update goal progress if applicable
   363	        if goal_id:
   364	            self._update_goal_progress(goal_id, trade_record)
   365	        
   366	        PrintStyle(color=\"green\").print(f\"Trade executed: {side} {size} {symbol} by {agent_name}\")
   367	        
   368	        return Response(

   370	            data=trade_record

content.text: Now let me create the API endpoint for the trading system:

input.content:
"""
Trading System API Endpoint
Handles all trading-related API requests
"""

import asyncio
import json
import logging
from flask import request, jsonify
from python.helpers.api import Api
from python.tools.trading_system import TradingSystem

class TradingSystemApi(Api):
    """API endpoint for trading system operations"""
    
    def __init__(self, agent):
        super().__init__(agent)
        self.trading_system = None
        
    def execute(self):
        """Execute trading system API request"""
        
        try:
            # Initialize trading system if not already done
            if not self.trading_system:
                self.trading_system = TradingSystem(self.agent)
            
            # Get request data
            data = request.get_json()
            action = data.get('action', 'status')
            
            # Execute the trading system operation
            result = self.trading_system.execute(**data)
            
            # Return formatted response
            return jsonify({
                'success': True,
                'message': result.message,
                'data': result.data
            })
            
        except Exception as e:
            logging.error(f"Trading system API error: {e}")
            return jsonify({
                'success': False,
                'error': str(e),
                'message': f'Trading system operation failed: {str(e)}'
            }), 500

# Export the API class
trading_system_api = TradingSystemApi

input.content:
#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
Enhanced Agent Zero Initialization Script
Initializes all trading system components and integrations
"""

import os
import sys
import asyncio
import logging
from datetime import datetime

# Add project root to path
sys.path.insert(0, os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__)))

# Import core modules
from python.helpers.print_style import PrintStyle
from python.helpers.dotenv import load_dotenv

# Import enhanced integrations
from python.helpers.autogen_integration import get_autogen_integration, create_default_trading_team
from python.helpers.letta_memory import get_letta_memory
from python.helpers.redis_integration import get_redis_integration
from python.helpers.supabase_integration import get_supabase_integration

def setup_logging():
    """Setup logging configuration"""
    logging.basicConfig(
        level=logging.INFO,
        format='%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s',
        handlers=[
            logging.FileHandler('logs/enhanced_system.log'),
            logging.StreamHandler(sys.stdout)
        ]
    )
    
def load_configuration():
    """Load environment configuration"""
    load_dotenv()
    
    config = {
        # Core settings
        'openai_api_key': os.getenv('OPENAI_API_KEY'),
        
        # Letta configuration
        'letta_base_url': os.getenv('LETTA_BASE_URL', 'http://localhost:8283'),
        
        # Redis configuration
        'redis_url': os.getenv('REDIS_URL', 'redis://localhost:6379'),
        
        # Supabase configuration
        'supabase_url': os.getenv('SUPABASE_URL'),
        'supabase_anon_key': os.getenv('SUPABASE_ANON_KEY'),
        
        # Hyperliquid configuration
        'hyperliquid_private_key': os.getenv('HYPERLIQUID_PRIVATE_KEY'),
        'hyperliquid_wallet_address': os.getenv('HYPERLIQUID_WALLET_ADDRESS'),
        'hyperliquid_testnet': os.getenv('HYPERLIQUID_TESTNET', 'true').lower() == 'true'
    }
    
    return config

def check_dependencies():
    """Check if all required dependencies are available"""
    PrintStyle(color="cyan").print("Checking dependencies...")
    
    dependencies_status = {}
    
    # Check AutoGen
    try:
        import autogen_agentchat
        dependencies_status['autogen'] = True
        PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ AutoGen available")
    except ImportError:
        dependencies_status['autogen'] = False
        PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("âš  AutoGen not available (will use fallback mode)")
    
    # Check Letta
    try:
        import letta
        dependencies_status['letta'] = True
        PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ Letta available")
    except ImportError:
        dependencies_status['letta'] = False
        PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("âš  Letta not available (will use fallback mode)")
    
    # Check Redis
    try:
        import redis
        dependencies_status['redis'] = True
        PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ Redis available")
    except ImportError:
        dependencies_status['redis'] = False
        PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("âš  Redis not available (will use fallback mode)")
    
    # Check Supabase
    try:
        from supabase import create_client
        dependencies_status['supabase'] = True
        PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ Supabase available")
    except ImportError:
        dependencies_status['supabase'] = False
        PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("âš  Supabase not available (will use fallback mode)")
    
    # Check Hyperliquid
    try:
        from hyperliquid.info import Info
        dependencies_status['hyperliquid'] = True
        PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ Hyperliquid SDK available")
    except ImportError:
        dependencies_status['hyperliquid'] = False
        PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("âš  Hyperliquid SDK not available (will use simulation mode)")
    
    return dependencies_status

def initialize_integrations(config):
    """Initialize all trading system integrations"""
    PrintStyle(color="cyan").print("Initializing trading system integrations...")
    
    integration_status = {}
    
    # Initialize AutoGen
    try:
        autogen = get_autogen_integration(config)
        integration_status['autogen'] = autogen.is_available()
        if integration_status['autogen']:
            PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ AutoGen integration initialized")
            
            # Create default trading team
            try:
                team = create_default_trading_team(config)
                PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ Default trading team created")
            except Exception as e:
                PrintStyle(color="yellow").print(f"âš  Failed to create default team: {e}")
        else:
            PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("âš  AutoGen integration in fallback mode")
    except Exception as e:
        integration_status['autogen'] = False
        PrintStyle(color="red").print(f"âœ— AutoGen initialization failed: {e}")
    
    # Initialize Letta Memory
    try:
        letta = get_letta_memory(config)
        integration_status['letta'] = letta.is_available()
        if integration_status['letta']:
            PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ Letta memory system initialized")
        else:
            PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("âš  Letta memory system in fallback mode")
    except Exception as e:
        integration_status['letta'] = False
        PrintStyle(color="red").print(f"âœ— Letta initialization failed: {e}")
    
    # Initialize Redis
    try:
        redis_client = get_redis_integration(config)
        integration_status['redis'] = redis_client.is_available()
        if integration_status['redis']:
            PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ Redis caching system initialized")
        else:
            PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("âš  Redis caching system in fallback mode")
    except Exception as e:
        integration_status['redis'] = False
        PrintStyle(color="red").print(f"âœ— Redis initialization failed: {e}")
    
    # Initialize Supabase
    try:
        supabase = get_supabase_integration(config)
        integration_status['supabase'] = supabase.is_available()
        if integration_status['supabase']:
            PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ Supabase database initialized")
        else:
            PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("âš  Supabase database in fallback mode")
    except Exception as e:
        integration_status['supabase'] = False
        PrintStyle(color="red").print(f"âœ— Supabase initialization failed: {e}")
    
    return integration_status

def create_database_schema():
    """Create necessary database tables and schema"""
    PrintStyle(color="cyan").print("Setting up database schema...")
    
    # This would typically create the necessary tables in Supabase
    # For now, we'll just log the schema that should be created
    
    schema_sql = """
    -- Trading Goals Table
    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS trading_goals (
        id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
        name TEXT NOT NULL,
        description TEXT,
        target_trades_per_day INTEGER DEFAULT 200,
        target_profit_per_day DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 5.0,
        assigned_agents TEXT[] DEFAULT '{}',
        status TEXT DEFAULT 'active',
        created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW(),
        updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW()
    );
    
    -- Trading Agents Table
    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS trading_agents (
        id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
        name TEXT NOT NULL,
        type TEXT DEFAULT 'trading',
        specialization TEXT DEFAULT 'general',
        configuration JSONB DEFAULT '{}',
        assigned_goals TEXT[] DEFAULT '{}',
        status TEXT DEFAULT 'active',
        created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW(),
        updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW()
    );
    
    -- Trade Executions Table
    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS trade_executions (
        id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
        agent_id TEXT,
        goal_id UUID REFERENCES trading_goals(id),
        symbol TEXT NOT NULL,
        trade_type TEXT NOT NULL,
        entry_price DECIMAL(20,8),
        exit_price DECIMAL(20,8),
        quantity DECIMAL(20,8),
        pnl DECIMAL(20,8),
        fees DECIMAL(20,8) DEFAULT 0,
        strategy TEXT,
        market_conditions TEXT,
        execution_time TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW(),
        created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW()
    );
    
    -- Trading Strategies Table
    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS trading_strategies (
        id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
        name TEXT NOT NULL,
        description TEXT,
        parameters JSONB DEFAULT '{}',
        sop_content TEXT,
        performance_metrics JSONB DEFAULT '{}',
        created_by TEXT,
        created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW(),
        updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW()
    );
    """
    
    PrintStyle(color="blue").print("Database schema defined (manual setup required in Supabase)")
    print(schema_sql)

def validate_configuration(config):
    """Validate the configuration and provide warnings for missing values"""
    PrintStyle(color="cyan").print("Validating configuration...")
    
    warnings = []
    
    if not config.get('openai_api_key'):
        warnings.append("OPENAI_API_KEY not set - AutoGen will not work")
    
    if not config.get('supabase_url') or not config.get('supabase_anon_key'):
        warnings.append("Supabase credentials not set - database will use fallback mode")
    
    if not config.get('hyperliquid_private_key'):
        warnings.append("Hyperliquid credentials not set - trading will use simulation mode")
    
    if warnings:
        PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("Configuration warnings:")
        for warning in warnings:
            PrintStyle(color="yellow").print(f"  âš  {warning}")
    else:
        PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ Configuration validated successfully")
    
    return len(warnings) == 0

def main():
    """Main initialization function"""
    PrintStyle(color="blue").print("=" * 60)
    PrintStyle(color="blue").print("Enhanced Agent Zero Trading System Initialization")
    PrintStyle(color="blue").print("=" * 60)
    
    # Setup logging
    setup_logging()
    
    # Load configuration
    config = load_configuration()
    
    # Validate configuration
    validate_configuration(config)
    
    # Check dependencies
    deps_status = check_dependencies()
    
    # Initialize integrations
    integration_status = initialize_integrations(config)
    
    # Setup database schema info
    create_database_schema()
    
    # Summary
    PrintStyle(color="blue").print("=" * 60)
    PrintStyle(color="blue").print("Initialization Summary")
    PrintStyle(color="blue").print("=" * 60)
    
    total_systems = len(integration_status)
    working_systems = sum(1 for status in integration_status.values() if status)
    
    PrintStyle(color="cyan").print(f"Systems initialized: {working_systems}/{total_systems}")
    
    for system, status in integration_status.items():
        status_icon = "âœ“" if status else "âš "
        status_color = "green" if status else "yellow"
        mode = "Live" if status else "Fallback"
        PrintStyle(color=status_color).print(f"  {status_icon} {system.title()}: {mode}")
    
    if working_systems == total_systems:
        PrintStyle(color="green").print("\nðŸŽ‰ All systems initialized successfully!")
        PrintStyle(color="green").print("Ready for autonomous trading operations.")
    else:
        PrintStyle(color="yellow").print(f"\nâš  {total_systems - working_systems} systems in fallback mode.")
        PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("Enhanced features available with limited functionality.")
    
    PrintStyle(color="blue").print("\nTo start the system:")
    PrintStyle(color="white").print("  python run_ui.py")
    PrintStyle(color="blue").print("\nTo install missing dependencies:")
    PrintStyle(color="white").print("  pip install -r enhanced_requirements.txt")
    PrintStyle(color="blue").print("=" * 60)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

toolUseResult.content:
#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
Enhanced Agent Zero Initialization Script
Initializes all trading system components and integrations
"""

import os
import sys
import asyncio
import logging
from datetime import datetime

# Add project root to path
sys.path.insert(0, os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__)))

# Import core modules
from python.helpers.print_style import PrintStyle
from python.helpers.dotenv import load_dotenv

# Import enhanced integrations
from python.helpers.autogen_integration import get_autogen_integration, create_default_trading_team
from python.helpers.letta_memory import get_letta_memory
from python.helpers.redis_integration import get_redis_integration
from python.helpers.supabase_integration import get_supabase_integration

def setup_logging():
    """Setup logging configuration"""
    logging.basicConfig(
        level=logging.INFO,
        format='%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s',
        handlers=[
            logging.FileHandler('logs/enhanced_system.log'),
            logging.StreamHandler(sys.stdout)
        ]
    )
    
def load_configuration():
    """Load environment configuration"""
    load_dotenv()
    
    config = {
        # Core settings
        'openai_api_key': os.getenv('OPENAI_API_KEY'),
        
        # Letta configuration
        'letta_base_url': os.getenv('LETTA_BASE_URL', 'http://localhost:8283'),
        
        # Redis configuration
        'redis_url': os.getenv('REDIS_URL', 'redis://localhost:6379'),
        
        # Supabase configuration
        'supabase_url': os.getenv('SUPABASE_URL'),
        'supabase_anon_key': os.getenv('SUPABASE_ANON_KEY'),
        
        # Hyperliquid configuration
        'hyperliquid_private_key': os.getenv('HYPERLIQUID_PRIVATE_KEY'),
        'hyperliquid_wallet_address': os.getenv('HYPERLIQUID_WALLET_ADDRESS'),
        'hyperliquid_testnet': os.getenv('HYPERLIQUID_TESTNET', 'true').lower() == 'true'
    }
    
    return config

def check_dependencies():
    """Check if all required dependencies are available"""
    PrintStyle(color="cyan").print("Checking dependencies...")
    
    dependencies_status = {}
    
    # Check AutoGen
    try:
        import autogen_agentchat
        dependencies_status['autogen'] = True
        PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ AutoGen available")
    except ImportError:
        dependencies_status['autogen'] = False
        PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("âš  AutoGen not available (will use fallback mode)")
    
    # Check Letta
    try:
        import letta
        dependencies_status['letta'] = True
        PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ Letta available")
    except ImportError:
        dependencies_status['letta'] = False
        PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("âš  Letta not available (will use fallback mode)")
    
    # Check Redis
    try:
        import redis
        dependencies_status['redis'] = True
        PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ Redis available")
    except ImportError:
        dependencies_status['redis'] = False
        PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("âš  Redis not available (will use fallback mode)")
    
    # Check Supabase
    try:
        from supabase import create_client
        dependencies_status['supabase'] = True
        PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ Supabase available")
    except ImportError:
        dependencies_status['supabase'] = False
        PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("âš  Supabase not available (will use fallback mode)")
    
    # Check Hyperliquid
    try:
        from hyperliquid.info import Info
        dependencies_status['hyperliquid'] = True
        PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ Hyperliquid SDK available")
    except ImportError:
        dependencies_status['hyperliquid'] = False
        PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("âš  Hyperliquid SDK not available (will use simulation mode)")
    
    return dependencies_status

def initialize_integrations(config):
    """Initialize all trading system integrations"""
    PrintStyle(color="cyan").print("Initializing trading system integrations...")
    
    integration_status = {}
    
    # Initialize AutoGen
    try:
        autogen = get_autogen_integration(config)
        integration_status['autogen'] = autogen.is_available()
        if integration_status['autogen']:
            PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ AutoGen integration initialized")
            
            # Create default trading team
            try:
                team = create_default_trading_team(config)
                PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ Default trading team created")
            except Exception as e:
                PrintStyle(color="yellow").print(f"âš  Failed to create default team: {e}")
        else:
            PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("âš  AutoGen integration in fallback mode")
    except Exception as e:
        integration_status['autogen'] = False
        PrintStyle(color="red").print(f"âœ— AutoGen initialization failed: {e}")
    
    # Initialize Letta Memory
    try:
        letta = get_letta_memory(config)
        integration_status['letta'] = letta.is_available()
        if integration_status['letta']:
            PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ Letta memory system initialized")
        else:
            PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("âš  Letta memory system in fallback mode")
    except Exception as e:
        integration_status['letta'] = False
        PrintStyle(color="red").print(f"âœ— Letta initialization failed: {e}")
    
    # Initialize Redis
    try:
        redis_client = get_redis_integration(config)
        integration_status['redis'] = redis_client.is_available()
        if integration_status['redis']:
            PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ Redis caching system initialized")
        else:
            PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("âš  Redis caching system in fallback mode")
    except Exception as e:
        integration_status['redis'] = False
        PrintStyle(color="red").print(f"âœ— Redis initialization failed: {e}")
    
    # Initialize Supabase
    try:
        supabase = get_supabase_integration(config)
        integration_status['supabase'] = supabase.is_available()
        if integration_status['supabase']:
            PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ Supabase database initialized")
        else:
            PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("âš  Supabase database in fallback mode")
    except Exception as e:
        integration_status['supabase'] = False
        PrintStyle(color="red").print(f"âœ— Supabase initialization failed: {e}")
    
    return integration_status

def create_database_schema():
    """Create necessary database tables and schema"""
    PrintStyle(color="cyan").print("Setting up database schema...")
    
    # This would typically create the necessary tables in Supabase
    # For now, we'll just log the schema that should be created
    
    schema_sql = """
    -- Trading Goals Table
    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS trading_goals (
        id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
        name TEXT NOT NULL,
        description TEXT,
        target_trades_per_day INTEGER DEFAULT 200,
        target_profit_per_day DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 5.0,
        assigned_agents TEXT[] DEFAULT '{}',
        status TEXT DEFAULT 'active',
        created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW(),
        updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW()
    );
    
    -- Trading Agents Table
    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS trading_agents (
        id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
        name TEXT NOT NULL,
        type TEXT DEFAULT 'trading',
        specialization TEXT DEFAULT 'general',
        configuration JSONB DEFAULT '{}',
        assigned_goals TEXT[] DEFAULT '{}',
        status TEXT DEFAULT 'active',
        created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW(),
        updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW()
    );
    
    -- Trade Executions Table
    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS trade_executions (
        id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
        agent_id TEXT,
        goal_id UUID REFERENCES trading_goals(id),
        symbol TEXT NOT NULL,
        trade_type TEXT NOT NULL,
        entry_price DECIMAL(20,8),
        exit_price DECIMAL(20,8),
        quantity DECIMAL(20,8),
        pnl DECIMAL(20,8),
        fees DECIMAL(20,8) DEFAULT 0,
        strategy TEXT,
        market_conditions TEXT,
        execution_time TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW(),
        created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW()
    );
    
    -- Trading Strategies Table
    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS trading_strategies (
        id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
        name TEXT NOT NULL,
        description TEXT,
        parameters JSONB DEFAULT '{}',
        sop_content TEXT,
        performance_metrics JSONB DEFAULT '{}',
        created_by TEXT,
        created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW(),
        updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW()
    );
    """
    
    PrintStyle(color="blue").print("Database schema defined (manual setup required in Supabase)")
    print(schema_sql)

def validate_configuration(config):
    """Validate the configuration and provide warnings for missing values"""
    PrintStyle(color="cyan").print("Validating configuration...")
    
    warnings = []
    
    if not config.get('openai_api_key'):
        warnings.append("OPENAI_API_KEY not set - AutoGen will not work")
    
    if not config.get('supabase_url') or not config.get('supabase_anon_key'):
        warnings.append("Supabase credentials not set - database will use fallback mode")
    
    if not config.get('hyperliquid_private_key'):
        warnings.append("Hyperliquid credentials not set - trading will use simulation mode")
    
    if warnings:
        PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("Configuration warnings:")
        for warning in warnings:
            PrintStyle(color="yellow").print(f"  âš  {warning}")
    else:
        PrintStyle(color="green").print("âœ“ Configuration validated successfully")
    
    return len(warnings) == 0

def main():
    """Main initialization function"""
    PrintStyle(color="blue").print("=" * 60)
    PrintStyle(color="blue").print("Enhanced Agent Zero Trading System Initialization")
    PrintStyle(color="blue").print("=" * 60)
    
    # Setup logging
    setup_logging()
    
    # Load configuration
    config = load_configuration()
    
    # Validate configuration
    validate_configuration(config)
    
    # Check dependencies
    deps_status = check_dependencies()
    
    # Initialize integrations
    integration_status = initialize_integrations(config)
    
    # Setup database schema info
    create_database_schema()
    
    # Summary
    PrintStyle(color="blue").print("=" * 60)
    PrintStyle(color="blue").print("Initialization Summary")
    PrintStyle(color="blue").print("=" * 60)
    
    total_systems = len(integration_status)
    working_systems = sum(1 for status in integration_status.values() if status)
    
    PrintStyle(color="cyan").print(f"Systems initialized: {working_systems}/{total_systems}")
    
    for system, status in integration_status.items():
        status_icon = "âœ“" if status else "âš "
        status_color = "green" if status else "yellow"
        mode = "Live" if status else "Fallback"
        PrintStyle(color=status_color).print(f"  {status_icon} {system.title()}: {mode}")
    
    if working_systems == total_systems:
        PrintStyle(color="green").print("\nðŸŽ‰ All systems initialized successfully!")
        PrintStyle(color="green").print("Ready for autonomous trading operations.")
    else:
        PrintStyle(color="yellow").print(f"\nâš  {total_systems - working_systems} systems in fallback mode.")
        PrintStyle(color="yellow").print("Enhanced features available with limited functionality.")
    
    PrintStyle(color="blue").print("\nTo start the system:")
    PrintStyle(color="white").print("  python run_ui.py")
    PrintStyle(color="blue").print("\nTo install missing dependencies:")
    PrintStyle(color="white").print("  pip install -r enhanced_requirements.txt")
    PrintStyle(color="blue").print("=" * 60)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
